message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

I appreciate your interest in the product, but I'm afraid I'm not willing to go as low as $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit, so I'm thinking of $110. What do you think?
I'm still interested in the product, but I really think $100 is the highest I'm willing to go. Would you be willing to meet me at $100?
